Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This exceptional item boasts a wide range of features that cater to various needs, ensuring both functionality and style. Given its quality and versatility, we believe it's worth more than just a premium price tag. I am extending an exclusive opportunity for you to own this product at a special introductory price of $145. This offer is tailored to appreciate your early interest and commitment to our brand. Don't miss out on this chance to experience the unparalleled benefits this product has to offer. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with your purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $145. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $145
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
